thread.title: Go90™ Gets Animated with Toon Goggles Content
thread.title_full: Go90™ Gets Animated with Toon Goggles Content

author: Jordan Warkol
title: Go90™ Gets Animated with Toon Goggles Content
text:
Toon GogglesTM, On-Demand Entertainment for Kids, will now feature its animated and live-action children's shows on Go90, a new mobile social entertainment network designed to make the web's best live and original content a shared social experience. Toon Goggles has curated a special selection of its kids' entertainment service for Go90, including comedy shorts, educational shows and animated episodes from around the world. As part of the Go90 experience, users will be able to Cut and Share their favorite clips, create Crews to follow a specific shows and categories and see what friends are watching.
"We are excited to announce this new partnership with Go90, which we know will be a major player in the world of combining social and video-on-demand," said Stephen L. Hodge, C.E.O. of Toon Goggles, Inc. "In offering our content along with a social experience, we see a great opportunity for both Toon Goggles to grow and Go90 to reach a wide audience of parents and teens."
Go90 is a free, ad supported social entertainment platform that is built for the mobile-first generation that will stream live events, original entertainment and the best of the web. Available on compatible iOS and Android devices soon, the network offers an indulgent selection of content geared toward millennials that primarily watch on their smartphones and tablets.
Toon Goggles' inclusion on the Go90 service gives fans a new way to share popular animated short-form comedy shows such as Bernard and Monk with friends.
About Toon Goggles
Toon Goggles, the On-Demand Entertainment Service for children, provides kid-safe and parent-friendly content worldwide. With animated and live-action shows, games, radio and 4K programming that adhere to COPPA (Children's Online Privacy Protection Act) compliance, it’s no wonder that Toon Goggles has entered into agreements with the biggest names in tablets and mobile devices. Toon Goggles is available on the iTunes® App Store, Google Play™ Store, Sony TVs, Roku set-top boxes and many other devices.
